divs: sighting detailsat 1:40 a.m. on thursday - 09\12\2013, i was looking through my 10 x 50 bushnell binoculars at the stars. it was at zenith, directly above me when i noticed something traveling from the west towards the east. they were moving fast but i heard no sound. total elapsed time was 25 seconds to totally cross from above to the east where i lost them. at first i thought it might have been 1 craft, triangular in shape with a small scout ship in front. then they all broke this v formation. they all became a bunch of semi-lit balls going in and around each other for several seconds. then they reformed into another v formation with the scout ship again in the front of the v. they were so dull that i thought they were a shadow of something, not really a ship until i took a really long look then i started gathering data. at first i thought they might be balloons but balloons do not reform into a v formation. i counted 16 small dull-grey round ball shaped objects that seemed to have a front area like a window that was illuminated. they moved similar across the sky just like a jet would but much faster. if you have ever looked at a jet through binoculars then you know what i mean. i believe they were in our atmosphere because i could see the stars pass way above the ufos when they were in the v formation. if i was to make a guess at the height of the objects, i would say 10 - 15 thousand feet. of course, everything is relative. if the objects were at jet stream height, the objects would be enormous. so i can not really say at what height they would have been.
